title: Marjhan
text: Marjhan doesn't untap during your untap step., Sacrifice a creature: Untap Marjhan. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.Marjhan can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.: Marjhan gets -1/-0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to target attacking creature without flying.When you control no Islands, sacrifice Marjhan.
